title: Robertson Martin Architects

images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Robertson Martin Architects. The average
  contract duration was 1.7 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $485.8K. The longest
  contract was 5.48 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $5.1M.
lookup_name: 'ROBERTSON MARTIN ARCHITECTS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '31'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '14'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '45%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '147%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '3.36'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '6.6M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.7'
s421_mean_contract_value: '485.8K'
s425_max_duration: '5.48'
s422_max_contract_value: '5.1M'
---
